description: Login to your account or Register a new account Please note, you must have cookies enabled on your browser in order for this site to operate correctly.In order to see the images you must also enable JAVA and ensure that any firewall you have allows both ports 80 and 81 through. If you wish to suggest additions or corrections to the database, please contact the Database Director, Dr. T. Mannack. Email: Tel: +44 1865 278084 Classical Art Research Centre is not able to reply to requests for photographs of objects, nor can it give permission for images to be reproduced in any form. Such requests must be directed to the museum or collection owning the object.

is_part_of.title: Classical Art Research Centre Extensible Database (XDB)
